onyomiExamples.meaning: virtuous mind, good intentions, good will, positive mindset, bona fides, good faith

kunyomiExamples.meaning: good, excellent, fine, nice, pleasant, agreeable, sufficient, enough, ready, prepared, profitable (deal, business offer, etc.), beneficial, OK, all right, fine, no problem
good thing, nice thing, good excuse, good grounds, good opportunity, interjection used to impress an idea or to urge a response
nicely, properly, well, skillfully, skilfully, frequently, often, I'm glad that you ..., thank you for ..., (you have) quite the nerve to, I don't know how you can ...
